name: wired-pangea
title: WIRED Pangea
subtitle: Uniting a publishing institution
synopsis:
When I first arrived at *WIRED* each section of the magazine had it's own unique Wordpress blog stitched together with some clever Apache rules. This made everything from updates to new features a massive headache.

As such, one of the first major projects I collaborated on was uniting all these separate instances into one heavily customized Wordpress theme that maintained the unique look and features of each.
